title: Client not patching.
body: Everytime i try to have the patch download it just says and error has occured,check the logs for more details,ive tried reinstalling it and repairing it,same results. Anyone else having these problems and or have a fix for it? Thanks.{{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Hi Yokomuri,

Has this happened before? What happens when you try and start the client?  Does it start patching, or not load at all?

Cheers,
Mindstar
It starts scanning the files and says an error has occurred around 3150 files. And not its not happened before.
Have yours finish patching yet? Can you tell me how please?

OK Thanks for clarifying.

I'd suggest a good place to start will be the "[Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)" article on our support site.  Since you've already tried to repair it, I'd definitely try out forcing a Re-Patch.

If that doesn't work - go through the steps to do a [full reinstall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) (I know you said you tried reinstalling, but make sure you read here to ensure that it you get rid of ALL files first).

Let me know how it goes.

Mindstar
I am also stuck on files scanned. I tried restarting my pc but still it just keep scanning files{{champion:32}}
I have the same problem this time and 5.15 last time too...... why it happens all the time
